answers.answer: Your typing and grammar is erratic so it is difficult to tell exactly what you are asking for. If asking how to determine diabetes, one goes to their doctor and gets tested. Test for diabetes can be one or more of the following tests:OGTT [Oral Glucose Tolerance Test] - You are given a sugary tasting liquid to drink then blood is drawn over several hours measuring your glucose [blood sugar] level.Fasting - Nothing to eat or drink for 8-10 hrs prior to blood drawAc1 - No fasting requires, can take anytime
